flowers.name: aster
flowers.label: Asters
flowers.text: The name Aster comes from the Ancient Greek word meaning star, referring to the shape of the flower head.

flowers.name: carnation
flowers.label: Carnations
flowers.text: Carnations require well-drained, neutral to slightly alkaline soil, and full sun. Examples include Gina Porto, Helen and Red Rocket

flowers.name: daffodil
flowers.label: Daffodils
flowers.text: Daffodil is a common English name, sometimes used for all varieties, and commonly used by the American Daffodil Society

flowers.name: rose
flowers.label: Roses
flowers.text: A rose is a woody perennial within the family Rosaceae. They form a group of erect shrubs, and climbing or trailing plants.

flowers.name: orchid
flowers.label: Orchids
flowers.text: The orchid family is a diverse and widespread family in the order Asparagales. It is one of the largest families of flowering plants.
